title: Thinking blocks not displaying in live chat despite hooks-streaming-ui being loaded
description: Thinking blocks are happening (visible in events.jsonl with content_block:start/end events) but hooks-streaming-ui is not displaying them during live execution. Tool calls ARE displaying correctly, so the hook module is loaded and working for tools but not for thinking blocks. Need to investigate why handle_content_block_start/end handlers aren't firing or aren't displaying output.
